summary.span: 使用绘图命令描述几何图形。

span.span: Describes a geometry using drawing commands.

summary.span: 此类与 类结合使用，以创建不支持数据绑定、动画或修改的轻量几何图形。

span.span: This class is used with the class to create a lightweight geometry that does not support data binding, animation, or modification.

exception.span: 尝试添加一条线段，但未通过调用 方法来指定图形的起点。

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void ArcTo (System.Windows.Point point, System.Windows.Size size, double rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked, bool isSmoothJoin);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ArcTo(valuetype System.Windows.Point point, valuetype System.Windows.Size size, float64 rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, valuetype System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked, bool isSmoothJoin) cil managed

public: abstract void ArcTo(System::Windows::Point point, System::Windows::Size size, double rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked, bool isSmoothJoin);

param.name: point
param.span: 弧线末尾的目标点。

span.span: The destination point for the end of the arc.

param.name: size
param.span: 其圆周用于绘制角度的椭圆的半径（半宽度和高度的一半）。

span.span: The radii (half the width and half the height) of an oval whose perimeter is used to draw the angle.

param.span: 如果椭圆在所有方向都呈圆角，弧线也将呈圆角；如果椭圆接近水平，弧线也将如此。例如，如果宽度和高度值很大，则表示椭圆很大，角的曲度很小。

span.span: If the oval is very rounded in all directions, the arc will be rounded, if it is nearly flat, so will the arc. For example, a very large width and height would represent a very large oval, which would give a slight curvature for the angle.

param.name: rotationAngle
param.span: 指定曲线的椭圆的旋转角度。

span.span: The rotation angle of the oval that specifies the curve.

param.span: 可以使用此参数来旋转弧线的曲面。

span.span: The curvature of the arc can be rotated with this parameter.

param.name: isLargeArc
param.span: 若要绘制大于 180 度的弧线，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to draw the arc greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, .

param.name: sweepDirection
param.span: 一个值，该值指示在 还是 方向绘制弧线。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the arc is drawn in the or direction.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现线段时使线段描边，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to make the segment stroked when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, .

param.name: isSmoothJoin
param.span: 在用 描边时，如果要将此线段与前一条线段之间的联接视为角，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a ; otherwise, .

summary.span: 绘制一条到指定点的弧线。

span.span: Draws an arc to the specified point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用前一条线段的终点作为其起点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是在图中的第一个段，它使用由指定的点方法作为其起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A如果它包含无法序列化或任何非描边或未填充的线段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何绘制弧使用方法。The following example shows how to draw an arc using the method. [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryArcToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/StreamGeometryArcToExample.cs#streamgeometryarctoexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryArcToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/streamgeometryarctoexample.vb#streamgeometryarctoexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void BeginFigure (System.Windows.Point startPoint, bool isFilled, bool isClosed);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginFigure(valuetype System.Windows.Point startPoint, bool isFilled, bool isClosed) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub BeginFigure (startPoint As Point, isFilled As Boolean, isClosed As Boolean)
public: abstract void BeginFigure(System::Windows::Point startPoint, bool isFilled, bool isClosed);

param.name: startPoint
param.span: 图开始的 。

span.span: The where the figure begins.

param.name: isFilled
param.span: 若要使用该图包含的区域进行命中测试、呈现和剪辑，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use the area contained by this figure for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping; otherwise, .

param.name: isClosed
param.span: 若要关闭图，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to close the figure; otherwise, .

param.span: 例如，如果绘制了两条连接线，并且 isClosed 设置为 ，则绘制的就只是两条线，但如果 isClosed 设置为 ，则这两条线将封闭进而形成一个三角形。

span.span: For example, if two connecting lines are drawn, and isClosed is set to , the drawing will just be of two lines but if isClosed is set to , the two lines will be closed to create a triangle.
Specifies the starting point for a new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过多次调用此方法，你可以创建多个数字 （自包含几何形状） 在此。By calling this method multiple times, you can create multiple figures (self-contained geometric shapes) within this . A如果它包含无法序列化或任何非描边或未填充的线段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.

summary.span: 绘制一条到指定点的贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Draws a Bezier curve to the specified point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由一个起点、 终点和两个控制点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, end point, and two control points. 第一个控制点确定的段的第一半曲率和第二个控制点确定的段的第二半曲率。The first control point determines the curvature of the first half of the segment, and the second control point determines the curvature of the second half of the segment. 此方法使用前一条线段的终点作为其起点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是在图中的第一个段，它使用由指定的点方法作为其起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A如果它包含无法序列化或任何非描边或未填充的线段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何绘制贝塞尔曲线使用方法。The following example shows how to draw a Bezier curve using the method. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Close ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Close ()
public: virtual void Close();

summary.span: 关闭此上下文并刷新其内容，以使其可以呈现。

span.span: Closes this context and flushes its content so that it can be rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭之后，无法修改上下文。Once closed, the context cannot be modified. 上下文必须先关闭，然后可以呈现其内容。The context must be closed before its content can be rendered.

exception.span: 已关闭或释放此上下文。

span.span: This context has already been closed or disposed.

param.span: 此列表中的点数应为三的倍数。

span.span: The number of points in this list should be a multiple of three.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现线段时使线段描边，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to make the segment stroked when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, .

param.name: isSmoothJoin

span.span: to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a ; otherwise, .

summary.span: 绘制一条或多条互相连接的贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Draws one or more connected Bezier curves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的第一个点`points`指定的第一个控制点，下一步指定第二个控制点，第三个点指定的终结点下, 一个点指定为下一条曲线，依次类推的第一个控制点。The first point in `points` specifies the first control point, the next specifies the second control point, the third point specifies the end point, the next point specifies the first control point of the next curve, and so on. 此方法使用前一条线段的终点作为其起点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是在图中的第一个段，它使用由指定的点方法作为其起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A如果它包含无法序列化或任何非描边或未填充的线段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何绘制多个连接的贝塞尔曲线使用方法。The following example shows how to draw multiple connected Bezier curves using the method. span.span: The control point used to specify the shape of the curve.

span.span: The destination point for the end of the curve.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现线段时使线段描边，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与三次方贝塞尔曲线上，使用两个控制点，不同二次贝塞尔曲线使用单个控点。Unlike a cubic Bezier curve, which uses two control points, a quadratic cubic Bezier curve uses a single control point. 此方法使用前一条线段的终点作为其起点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是在图中的第一个段，它使用由指定的点方法作为其起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A如果它包含无法序列化或任何非描边或未填充的线段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何绘制二次贝塞尔曲线使用方法。The following example shows how to draw a quadratic Bezier curve using the method.
